name: Bitcoin Price Projection - $1M Target
description: Comprehensive analysis of Bitcoin price trajectories under different adoption scenarios, projecting from $70,000 to $1,000,000 over 30 years

metadata.notes: Analyzes five key scenarios for Bitcoin reaching $1M: baseline growth (40%), institutional adoption (55%), fiat crisis (65%), regulatory clarity (50%), and combined shock (75%). Includes comprehensive risk assessment and investment recommendations.
